name: Product HQ - A Notion dashboard
description: Use code FRIDAY for 50% off!Product HQ is a Notion dashboard that helps you ideate, design and source your product.What is this?Product HQ is an actionable dashboard that details the journey from designing your product, to talking with suppliers, to purchasing and receiving a bulk order. Product HQ breaks this journey down into 3 stages, 12 sections, and 40 sub-sections. Product HQ provides actionable tasks for each sub-section and dozens of databases and templates!Designing, sourcing and orderi
